name: api_editor_Gizmos
description: Gizmos are used to give visual debugging or setup aids in the Scene view.

properties.name: CalculateLOD
properties.description: Determines the appropriate level of detail for a gizmo in the Scene view at a specified position with a specified radius.

properties.name: DrawCube
properties.description: Draws a solid box at center with size in the Scene view for visualization and debugging purposes.

properties.name: DrawFrustum
properties.description: Draws a camera frustum using the currently set Gizmos.matrix for its location and rotation.

properties.name: DrawGUITexture
properties.description: Draw a texture in the Scene.

properties.name: DrawIcon
properties.description: Draw an icon at a position in the Scene view.

properties.name: DrawLine
properties.description: Draws a line between two points in the Scene view.

properties.name: DrawLineList
properties.description: Draws multiple lines between pairs of points.

properties.name: DrawLineStrip
properties.description: Draws a line between each point in the supplied span.

properties.name: DrawMesh
properties.description: Draws a mesh gizmo at the specified transform.

properties.name: DrawRay
properties.description: Draws a ray starting at a specified position from and extending in a given direction in the Scene view.

properties.name: DrawSphere
properties.description: Draws a solid color sphere with center and radius in the Scene view.

properties.name: DrawWireCube
properties.description: Draws a wireframe box at center with size in the Scene view for visualization and debugging purposes.

properties.name: DrawWireMesh
properties.description: Draws a wireframe of a mesh at the specified transform.

properties.name: DrawWireSphere
properties.description: Draws a wireframe sphere with center and radius in the Scene view.
